title: Distance Travelled
description: A car travels at 70 km/h for 4 hours. How far does it go?

title: Simple Interest
description: Find the simple interest on $2000 at 6% per annum for 2 years.

title: Quadratic Root
description: Find the larger root of x² - 7x + 12 = 0.

title: Area of Triangle
description: Find the area of a triangle with base 10 units and height 8 units.

title: Circle Circumference
description: What is the circumference of a circle with radius 7 cm? (π = 22/7)

title: Derivative Evaluation
description: If f(x) = x³, find f'(2).

title: Integral Evaluation
description: Evaluate ∫₀¹ x dx.

title: Matrix Trace
description: Find the trace of the matrix [[2, 0], [0, 5]].

title: Probability of Even
description: What is the probability of rolling an even number on a six-sided die?

title: Mean of Data
description: Find the mean of the numbers 3, 7, 8, and 12.

title: Solve Linear Equation
description: Solve for x: 3x - 5 = 10.

title: Trigonometric Value
description: What is cos(60°)?

title: Slope of Line
description: Find the slope of the line passing through (1,2) and (4,8).

title: Logarithm
description: What is log₁₀(100)?

title: LCM of Two Numbers
description: Find the LCM of 12 and 18.

title: HCF of Two Numbers
description: Find the HCF of 45 and 75.

title: Permutation
description: How many ways can you arrange the letters A, B, C?

title: Mean of First 5 Odd Numbers
description: Find the mean of the first 5 odd natural numbers.

title: Right Triangle Hypotenuse
description: Find the hypotenuse of a right triangle with legs 6 and 8.

title: Derivative
description: If y = sin(x), find dy/dx at x = π/2.

title: Algebra - Solve for y
description: If 2y + 5 = 15, what is y?

title: Algebra - Expand Expression
description: Expand (x + 2)(x - 3).

title: Algebra - Solve System
description: Solve for x: 2x + 3y = 12 and x - y = 2 (find x when y = 2).

title: Algebra - Factor Polynomial
description: Factor completely: x^2 - 9.

title: Calculus - Limit
description: Find the limit: limₓ→0 (sin x)/x.

title: Calculus - Derivative
description: If f(x) = e^x, find f'(0).

title: Geometry - Perimeter
description: Find the perimeter of a square with side length 9 units.

title: Geometry - Volume of Cylinder
description: Find the volume of a cylinder with radius 3 units and height 5 units (use π = 3.14).

title: Linear Algebra - Inverse
description: Find the inverse of the matrix [[1, 0], [0, 1]].

title: Linear Algebra - Eigenvalue
description: Find an eigenvalue of the matrix [[2, 0], [0, 3]].

title: Linear Algebra - Matrix Addition
description: Add the matrices [[1,2],[3,4]] and [[4,3],[2,1]]. What is the (1,1) entry?

title: Linear Algebra - Dot Product
description: Find the dot product of vectors [1, 2] and [3, 4].

title: Number Theory - Prime Check
description: Is 17 a prime number?

title: Number Theory - Next Prime
description: What is the next prime number after 19?

title: Number Theory - Divisibility
description: Is 105 divisible by 5?

title: Probability - Coin Toss
description: What is the probability of tossing a head with a fair coin?

title: Probability - Dice Sum
description: What is the probability of rolling a sum of 7 with two dice?

title: Probability - Card Draw
description: What is the probability of drawing a heart from a standard deck?

title: Statistics - Median
description: Find the median of the data set: 3, 5, 7, 9, 11.

title: Statistics - Mode
description: What is the mode of the numbers: 2, 4, 4, 5, 6?

title: Statistics - Range
description: Find the range of the numbers: 12, 7, 9, 15, 10.

title: Trigonometry - tan 45°
description: What is tan(45°)?

title: Trigonometry - sin 90°
description: What is sin(90°)?

title: Trigonometry - cos 0°
description: What is cos(0°)?

title: Trigonometry - Pythagorean Identity
description: If sin²x + cos²x = ?, what is the value?
